plot: Young Italian workers explain to the Parliament their problems in finding a job, in making a living out of a low salary, in participating in public life.
title: Caro Parlamento
plot_es: Young Italian workers explain to the Parliament their problems in finding a job, in making a living out of a low salary, in participating in public life.
plot_en: Young Italian workers explain to the Parliament their problems in finding a job, in making a living out of a low salary, in participating in public life.
